00070 char * Factory_http_header(char * buff, unsigned short int status_code){
00071 
00072 switch (status_code){
00073         case 200 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"OK\0");                         break;
00074         case 400 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Bad Request\0");                        break;
00075         case 403 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Forbidden\0");                  break;
00076         case 404 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Not Found\0");                  break;
00077         case 405 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Method Not Allowed\0");                 break;
00078         case 408 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Request Timeout\0");            break;
00079         case 411 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Length required\0");            break;
00080         case 413 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Entity too long\0");            break;
00081         case 414 :      sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Uri too large\0");              break;
00082         default :               sprintf_P(buff,header_http,status_code,"Internal Error\0");                                             
00083 }
00084 
00085 return buff;
00086 }
00087 /*
00088 #define N 2
00089 int     getnbr(char *str)
00090 {
00091   char  base[16] = "0123456789ABCDEF";
00092   int   i, res, pow;
00093 
00094 // le i < 16, c'est moche, mais un strlen(base) ou un base[i] != NULL, c'est pas forcément plus optimisé 
00095   for (i = res = 0, pow = N - 1; i < 16 && pow > -1; i++)
00096     if (base[i] == *(str - pow + (N - 1)))
00097     {
00098       res *= 16;
00099       res += i;
00100       pow--;
00101       i = 0;
00102     }
00103 
00104   return res;
00105 }

00120    // TODO : Mieux faire !!!

00122                         r = 0;
00123       for(i = 0; i < strlen(str); i++)
00124           if(str[i] == ':' || r) 
00125              {
00126                 str[i] = str[i+1];
00127                 r = 1;
00128              }

00146 
00147 printf("UIP : ");

00149 printf("\n-----------\"");

00214 void nextUrlFoled(char * url, char * buff){
00215         char * temp;
00216         temp = strchr((char*) url,'/');
00217         sprintf(buff, "%s",(temp+1));
00218         sprintf(url,buff);
00219 }

00221 char* extractBodyValue(char * str1, const char * str2, char * dst){
00222         static int l=-1;
00223         static char * temp;
00224 
00225         temp  = strstr_P(str1,str2);
00226         if(temp != NULL){
00227                 temp =strstr(temp,":\"");
00228                 temp += 2;
00229                 sprintf(dst,"%s",temp);
00230                 l = 1;
00231                 while((dst[l] != '\0' && dst[l] != '"') || dst[l-1] == '\\') l++;
00232                 dst[l] = 0;
00233 
00234                 return dst;
00235         }
00236 
00237 return NULL;
00238 }

00298 
00299 void lookup_method(struct RestConnection * conn){
00300   if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->SocketBuff,get, 4) == 0)                            conn->method = GET;
00301         else if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->SocketBuff,put, 4) == 0)                 conn->method = PUT;
00302         else if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->SocketBuff, post, 6) == 0)               conn->method = POST;
00303         else if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->SocketBuff, delete, 7) == 0)             conn->method = DELETE;
00304 }
00305 
00306 static PT_THREAD(handle_connection(struct RestConnection * conn)){
00307         static struct Ressource * PtRessource = NULL;
00308         static char * temp;
00309         static int i=-1,j=-1,k=-1,DataFlag=0;
00310 
00311         PT_BEGIN(&conn->SocketPt);
00312 
00313         //  Starting socket, this thread will block on this point while the PSOCK execution is running
00314         PSOCK_BEGIN(&conn->Socket);
00315 
00316         // Abort the connection if the timeout expired
00317         if(conn->timeout++ > TIMEOUT){
00318                 _PRINTF("Input HTTP request : timeout...\n");
00319                 uip_abort();
00320                 PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&conn->Socket);
00321         }
00322 
00323         _PRINTF("Input HTTP request : process...\n");
00324 
00325         // Looking for method involve
00326         PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket, ' ');
00327         lookup_method(conn);
00328 
00329         // Looking for url involve
00330         PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket, ' ');
00331         sprintf((char*)conn->url, (char*)conn->SocketBuff);
00332         nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00333 
00334         /**************************************************************************
00335         * GET METHOD :
00336         *               {
00337         *               "name":"temperature",
00338         *               "uri":"http://[cccc::3332:3334:2000:0000]/data/temperature/"}
00339         *               }
00340         *
00341         * GET /
00342         *       
00343         * GET /data/\*
00344         * GET /data/{RESSOURCE_name}/
00345         *       {
00346         *               "unit":"lux",
00347         *               "InstatenousRate":"105"
00348         *               }
00349         * GET /data/{RESSOURCE_name}/report/
00350         *               {
00351         *       "uri":"http://[3ffe:0501:ffff:0100:0206:98ff:fe00:0231]/notify.php",
00352         *       "name":"brightness",
00353         *       "period":"-1",
00354         *       }
00355         * GET /data/\*\/report
00356         * GET /data/{*|RESSOURCE_name}/log/
00357         *
00358         **************************************************************************/
00359         if(conn->method == GET){
00360 
00361                                 DataFlag = NONE;
00362                                 j = 0;
00363 
00364                                 // GET /data/
00365                                 if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,url_data,5) == 0){
00366                                         nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00367                 
00368                                 // Check if the request is about all the sensor
00369                                 if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,url_all,1) == 0)
00370                                         DataFlag |= (1 << GET_ALL_DATA); 
00371 
00372                                 // Looking for data method
00373                                 sprintf((char*)conn->Buff2,(char*)conn->url);
00374                                 nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00375 
00376                                 if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,url_log,3) == 0)
00377                                         DataFlag |= (1 << GET_LOG);
00378                                 else if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,url_meta,4) == 0)
00379                                         DataFlag |= (1 << GET_META);
00380                                 else DataFlag |= (1 << GET_DATA);
00381 
00382                                 sprintf((char*)conn->url,(char*)conn->Buff2);
00383 
00384                                 // Send header
00385                                 if(DataFlag != NONE)
00386                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 200));
00387 
00388                                 // Browse the sensor list
00389                                 if (DataFlag & (1 << GET_ALL_DATA))
00390                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,"[");
00391 
00392                                 for(PtRessource = list_head(ressources_list);PtRessource != NULL; PtRessource = PtRessource->next) {
00393 
00394                                                 // Send sensor data if there is necessary
00395                                                 if(strncmp(PtRessource->name,(char*) conn->url, strlen(PtRessource->name)) == 0 || DataFlag & (1 << GET_ALL_DATA)){
00396 
00397                                                         // GET /data/{RESSOURCE_name}/
00398                                                         if(DataFlag & (1 << GET_DATA)){
00399                                                                 #if SEND_NOTIFY
00400                                                                 sprintf((char*)conn->MiniBuff,"%d",PtRessource->value); 
00401                                                                 #else
00402                                                                 sprintf((char*)conn->MiniBuff,"%d",PtRessource->getData()); 
00403                                                                 #endif
00404                                                                 Factory_http_balise_data((char*)conn->Buff,PtRessource->name, PtRessource->unit,"0",(char*)conn->MiniBuff);
00405                                                                 SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,(char*)conn->Buff);
00406                                                                 
00407 
00408                                                                 if(PtRessource->next != NULL && (DataFlag & (1 << GET_ALL_DATA)))
00409                                                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,",");
00410 
00411                                                                 }
00412 
00413                                                         // GET /data/{RESSOURCE_name}/meta/
00414                                                         else if(DataFlag & (1 << GET_META)){

00416                                                                 SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,(char*)conn->Buff);

00465                                                         }

00564 
00565                                 SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,"[\n");
00566                                 // Browse the sensor list
00567                                 for(PtRessource = list_head(ressources_list);PtRessource != NULL; PtRessource = PtRessource->next) {
00568 
00569                                 // Looking for host address
00570                                 for(i = 0; i < UIP_CONF_NETIF_MAX_ADDRESSES; i ++)
00571                                                 if(uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].state != NOT_USED && uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].state != TENTATIVE){
00572 
00573                                                 sprintf_P(      (char*)conn->Buff2,url_ressource,       
00574                                                                                         ((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[0],((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[1],            
00575                                                                                   ((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[8],((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[9],
00576                                                                                         ((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[10],((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[11],
00577                                                                                         ((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[12],((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[13],
00578                                                                                         ((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[14],((u8_t *)(&uip_netif_physical_if.addresses[i].ipaddr))[15],                                                                          
00579                                                                                         PtRessource->name);                             
00580                                                 }
00581                                         
00582                                         sprintf_P((char*)conn->Buff,racine_uri,(char*)PtRessource->name,(char*)conn->Buff2);
00583                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,(char*)conn->Buff);
00584 
00585                                         if(PtRessource->next != NULL)
00586                                                 SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,",");
00587                                 }
00588                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,"]\n");
00589                         }
00590                 else SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 404));
00591                 }
00592         /**************************************************************************
00593         * PUT METHOD :
00594         * PUT /data/{RESSOURCE_name}/
00595         *
00596         * Body example : 
00597         * {
00598         * "value":"100"
00599         * }
00600         **************************************************************************/
00601         else if (conn->method == PUT) {
00602                 _PRINTF("[HTTP] Put method\n");
00603                 DataFlag = NONE;
00604 
00605                 _PRINTF("[HTTP] Read URI ...\n");
00606                 if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,report,6) == 0)
00607                         DataFlag |= (1 << GET_REPORT);
00608                 else if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,url_data,4) == 0) 
00609                         DataFlag |= (1 << GET_DATA);
00610 
00611                 // Check if the request is about all the sensor
00612                 nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00613                 if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,url_all,1) == 0)
00614                         DataFlag |= (1 << GET_ALL_DATA); 
00615 
00616                 if(DataFlag == NONE)
00617                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 404));
00618 
00619                 else    {
00620 
00621                         /* Store the name of the ressource*/
00622                         i =0;
00623                         while(((char*)conn->url)[i] != '/' && ((char*)conn->url)[i] != '\0'){
00624                                 conn->Buff2[i] = conn->url[i];
00625                                 i++;
00626                                 }
00627                         conn->Buff2[i] = 0;
00628 
00629                         _PRINTF("[HTTP] Read http header ...\n");
00630                         /* Store the size of content*/
00631                         do {
00632                                 PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket, '\n');
00633 
00634                                 if(strncmp_P((char*) conn->SocketBuff, content_length,15) == 0){
00635                                                 temp = strchr((char*) conn->SocketBuff, ':');
00636                                                 temp = strchr((char*) conn->SocketBuff, ' ');
00637                                                 i=0;
00638                                                 while(temp[i] != '\r' && temp[i] != 0 && temp[i] != ' ' ) i++;
00639                                                 temp[i-1] = 0;
00640 
00641                                                 // Save the content length
00642                                                 j = atoi(temp);
00643                                 }
00644 
00645                                 // End of the header
00646                                 if(((char*)conn->SocketBuff)[0] == '\r')
00647                                         break;
00648                         }
00649                         while(1);
00650 
00651                         // **ERROR** If no content length found, we leave the connection
00652                         if(j == -1)                     {
00653                                 SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 411));
00654                                 uip_abort();
00655                                 PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&conn->Socket);
00656                         }
00657                         i = 0;
00658 
00659                         // Looking for the subsection (Report)
00660                         nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00661 
00662                         // Looking for ressource access
00663                         for(PtRessource = list_head(ressources_list);PtRessource != NULL; PtRessource = PtRessource->next) 
00664 
00665                                 // PUT on data or the data
00666                                 if(strcmp(PtRessource->name,(char*)conn->Buff2) == 0 || strncmp(url_all,(char*)conn->Buff2,1) == 0){
00667 
00668                                         // Report update
00669                                         if (DataFlag & (1 << GET_REPORT)){
00670                                                 _PRINTF("[HTTP] Update report\n");
00671                                                 // Get the ID & load the report
00672                                                 nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00673 
00674                                                 REPORT_OPEN(&conn->Subscriber, atoi((char*) conn->url));
00675                                         }
00676 
00677                                         /* Parse of HTTP Body 
00678                                          * Note : the body muse be terminated by \n for leaving loop                    
00679                                         */
00680                                         _PRINTF("[HTTP] read http body ...\n");
00681 
00682                                         do {
00683                                         // Read line of content
00684                                         PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket,'\n');
00685 
00686                                         for (k =0; k < (PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket)/BUFFER_SIZE)+1; k++){
00687                                                         memcpy(conn->Buff,conn->SocketBuff + ((k)*BUFFER_SIZE),PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket));
00688                                                         conn->Buff[(PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket))-1] = 0;
00689                                                         i += (PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket));
00690 
00691                                                         // PUT /data/{sensor}/report/
00692                                                         if (DataFlag & (1 << GET_REPORT))
00693                                                                 SubscriberFactory(&conn->Subscriber, (char*) conn->Buff, (char*)conn->Buff2);
00694 
00695                                                         // PUT /data/{sensor}/
00696                                                         else {
00697                                                                 _PRINTF("[HTTP] Update ressource request found...\n");
00698 
00699                                                                 // Check data value
00700                                                                 if(extractBodyValue((char *)conn->Buff, emmal_attribute_value, (char*)conn->Buff2) != NULL){
00701                                                                         if(PtRessource->setData != NULL){
00702                                                                                 // Set the new value if it's a writable data
00703                                                                                 _PRINTF("[HTTP] Updating ressource data...\n");
00704                                                                                 PtRessource->setData(Emmal_evaluate((char*)conn->Buff2));
00705                                                                                 SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 200));
00706                                                                                 }
00707                                                                         else SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 403));
00708                                                                         i = j;
00709                                                                         break;
00710                                                                         }
00711                                                                 } // GET /data/{sensor}/
00712                                                         }
00713                                                 }
00714                                         while(i+1 < j);
00715 
00716                                         break;
00717                                         }
00718                 }       
00719 
00720         if (DataFlag & (1 << GET_REPORT)){
00721                 if(REPORT_UPDATE(&conn->Subscriber, (char*)conn->Buff2) == 0)           
00722                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 200));
00723                 else    SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 500));
00724                 }
00725                         
00726         }
00727         /**************************************************************************
00728         * POST METHOD :
00729         * POST /data/{RESSOURCE_name}/report/
00730         *
00731         * Body example : 
00732         * {
00733         * "host":"[cccc::3332:3334:2000:0]",
00734         * "uri":"notify/",
00735         * "name":"temperature",
00736         * "period":"1000",
00737         * }
00738         **************************************************************************/
00739         else if (conn->method == POST) {
00740 
00741                                 if(strncmp_P((char*) conn->url,report,6) != 0)
00742                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 404));
00743 
00744                                 else    {
00745                                 nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00746 
00747                                 uip_ip6addr(&conn->Subscriber.host, 0x0000, 0x0000,0x0000,0x0000,0x0000,0x0000,0x0000,0x0000);
00748                                 conn->Subscriber.port = 80;
00749                                 conn->Subscriber.id = -1;
00750                                 conn->Subscriber.uri[0] = '\0';
00751                                 conn->Subscriber.method = 1;
00752                                 sprintf(conn->Subscriber.body,"\0");
00753 
00754                                 conn->Subscriber.time   = 0;
00755                                 conn->Subscriber.condition[0]   = '\0';
00756                                 // BODY PARSING
00757 
00758                         /* Parse of HTTP header*/
00759                         do {
00760                                 PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket, '\n');
00761 
00762                                 if(strncmp_P((char*) conn->SocketBuff, content_length,15) == 0){
00763                                                 temp = strchr((char*) conn->SocketBuff, ':');
00764                                                 temp = strchr((char*) conn->SocketBuff, ' ');
00765                                                 i=0;
00766                                                 while(temp[i] != '\r' && temp[i] != 0 && temp[i] != ' ' ) i++;
00767                                                 temp[i-1] = 0;
00768 
00769                                                 // Save the content length
00770                                                 j = atoi(temp);
00771                                 }
00772 
00773                                 // End of the header
00774                                 if(((char*)conn->SocketBuff)[0] == '\r')
00775                                         break;
00776                         }
00777                         while(1);
00778 
00779                         // **ERROR** If no content length found, we leave the connection
00780                         if(j == -1 || j == 0){
00781                                 SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 411));
00782                                 uip_abort();
00783                                 PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&conn->Socket);
00784                         }
00785                         i = 0;
00786 
00787                         /* Parse of HTTP Body 
00788                          * Note : the body muse be terminated by \n for leaving loop                    
00789                         */
00790                         do {
00791                         // Read line of content
00792                         PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket,'\n');
00793 
00794                         for (k =0; k < (PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket)/BUFFER_SIZE)+1; k++){
00795                                         memcpy(conn->Buff,conn->SocketBuff + ((k)*BUFFER_SIZE),PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket));
00796                                         conn->Buff[(PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket))-1] = 0;
00797                                         i += (PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket));
00798 
00799                                         SubscriberFactory(&conn->Subscriber, (char*) conn->Buff, (char*)conn->Buff2);
00800                                         }
00801                 }
00802                         while(i+1 < j);
00803 
00804                                 if(REPORT_NEW(&conn->Subscriber, (char*)conn->Buff2) == 0)              
00805                                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 200));
00806                                 else    SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 500));
00807                         
00808                         }
00809                 }
00810         /**************************************************************************
00811         * DELETE METHOD :
00812         * POST /data/\*\/report/
00813         *
00814         **************************************************************************/
00815         else if(conn->method == DELETE){
00816                 if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,report,6) == 0){
00817 
00818                                         // Jump to the {IdReport | *}
00819                                         nextUrlFoled((char*) conn->url, (char*) conn->Buff);
00820                                         if(strncmp_P((char*)conn->url,url_all,1) == 0){
00821                                                 if(REPORT_FORMAT (&conn->Subscriber,(char*)conn->Buff) == 0)
00822                                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 200));
00823                                                 else SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 500));
00824                                         }
00825                                         else if(atoi((char*)conn->url) != 0) {
00826                                                 if(REPORT_DELETE (&conn->Subscriber,(char*)conn->Buff, atoi((char*) conn->url)) == 0)
00827                                                         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 200));
00828                                                 else SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 500));
00829                                         }                               
00830                 }
00831                 // Bad URL structure
00832                 else    SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 404));
00833         }
00834         else SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,Factory_http_header((char*)conn->Buff, 405));
00835         
00836         _PRINTF("Input HTTP request : Terminated [SUCCESS]");
00837 
00838         PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&conn->Socket);
00839         PSOCK_END(&conn->Socket);
00840 
00841         PT_END(&conn->SocketPt);
00842 }
00843 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00844 static PT_THREAD(notify_connection(struct RestNotify * conn))
00845 {
00846         static char * temp;
00847         static int i;
00848 
00849         PT_BEGIN(&conn->SocketPt);
00850         PSOCK_BEGIN(&conn->Socket);
00851         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Sending request...\n");
00852         // Abort the connection if the timeout expired
00853         if(conn->timeout++ > TIMEOUT){
00854                 uip_abort();
00855                 _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Timeout during sending...\n");
00856                 PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&conn->Socket);
00857         }
00858 
00859         //  Starting socket, this thread will block on this point while the PSOCK execution is running
00860         sprintf_P((char*)conn->Buff,header_notify,&conn->Subscriber.method, conn->Subscriber.uri);
00861         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,(char*)conn->Buff);
00862         // Send body
00863 
00864         // Extract back slash if necessary
00865         for(i=0; i<strlen(conn->Subscriber.body); i++)
00866                 if(conn->Subscriber.body[i] == '\\'){
00867                         for(; i<strlen(conn->Subscriber.body)-1; i++)
00868                                 conn->Subscriber.body[i] = conn->Subscriber.body[i+1];
00869                         i = 0;
00870                 }
00871 //printf("BODY : %s\n",conn->Subscriber.body);
00872                         
00873         SEND_STRING(&conn->Socket,conn->Subscriber.body);
00874 
00875         /* Parse of HTTP header*/
00876         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Response header reading ...\n");
00877         do {
00878                 PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket, '\n');
00879 
00880                                 if(strncmp_P((char*) conn->SocketBuff, content_length,15) == 0){
00881                                                 temp = strchr((char*) conn->SocketBuff, ':');
00882                                                 temp = strchr((char*) conn->SocketBuff, ' ');
00883                                                 conn->i=0;
00884                                                 while(temp[conn->i] != '\r' && temp[conn->i] != 0 && temp[conn->i] != ' ' ) conn->i++;
00885                                                 temp[conn->i-1] = 0;
00886 
00887                                                 // Save the content length
00888                                                 conn->j = atoi(temp);
00889                                 }
00890 
00891                                 // End of the header
00892                                 if(((char*)conn->SocketBuff)[0] == '\r')
00893                                         break;
00894                         }
00895         
00896                         while(1);
00897         /* END of HTTP header */
00898 
00899                 _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Response body reading ...\n");
00900                         /* Parse of HTTP Body 
00901                          * Note : the body muse be terminated by \n for leaving loop                    
00902                         */
00903                         do {
00904                         // Read line of content
00905                         PSOCK_READTO(&conn->Socket,'\n');
00906 
00907                         for (conn->k =0; conn->k < (PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket)/BUFFER_SIZE)+1; conn->k++){
00908                                         memcpy(conn->Buff,conn->SocketBuff + ((conn->k)*BUFFER_SIZE),PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket));
00909                                         conn->Buff[(PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket))-1] = 0;
00910                                         conn->i += (PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket) > BUFFER_SIZE ? BUFFER_SIZE-2: PSOCK_DATALEN(&conn->Socket));
00911 
00912                                 //      printf("R:%s\n",conn->Buff);
00913                                         }
00914                 }
00915                         while(conn->i+1 < conn->j);
00916         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Response reading [SUCCESS]\n");
00917         /* END HTTP Body*/
00918 
00919         // Close the connection
00920         uip_close();
00921 
00922         PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&conn->Socket);
00923         PSOCK_END(&conn->Socket);
00924         PT_END(&conn->SocketPt);
00925 }
00926 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00927 void app_rest(void * data){
00928   int i=0;
00929   struct RestConnection * conn = (struct RestConnection *) data;
00930 _PRINTF("**AppRest handle**\n");
00931 if(uip_connected()){
00932         _PRINTF("New connexion : ");
00933 
00934         // If data are associated to the connection, so this connection is already instanciate by this node : !Notify request
00935         if(data != NULL)
00936                 if (((struct RestNotify*)data)->method == NOTIFY){
00937                         PT_INIT(&((struct RestNotify *)data)->SocketPt);
00938                         PSOCK_INIT(&((struct RestNotify*)data)->Socket, ((struct RestNotify*)data)->SocketBuff, sizeof(((struct RestNotify*)data)->SocketBuff) - 1);
00939                         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Responce processing...\n");
00940 
00941                         notify_connection(((struct RestNotify*)data));
00942                 return;
00943         }
00944 
00945         _PRINTF("HTTP Request\n");
00946         connection_flag = 1;
00947 
00948         // No data associated, so we create data connection : !Incomming request
00949         conn = (struct RestConnection *) memb_alloc(&conns);
00950         if (conn == NULL){
00951                 _PRINTF("Not able to allocate a new connection\n");
00952                 uip_abort();
00953                 return;
00954         }
00955 
00956         conn->method = NO_SPECIFY;
00957         conn->timeout = 0;
00958         conn->url[0] = '\0';
00959         while(i < BUFFER_SIZE)  conn->SocketBuff[i++] = '\0';
00960         tcp_markconn(uip_conn, conn);
00961 
00962         PSOCK_INIT(&conn->Socket, conn->SocketBuff, sizeof(conn->SocketBuff) - 1);
00963         PT_INIT(&conn->SocketPt);
00964 
00965         handle_connection(data);
00966 }
00967 else if(uip_aborted()){
00968                 _PRINTF("aborted\n");
00969                 if(data != NULL)                memb_free(&noti, data);
00970                 if(conn != NULL)                memb_free(&conns, conn);
00971                 connection_flag = 0;
00972                 return;
00973     }
00974 else if(uip_closed()){
00975                 _PRINTF("closed\n");
00976                 if(data != NULL)                memb_free(&noti, data);
00977                 if(conn != NULL)                memb_free(&conns, conn);
00978                 connection_flag = 0;
00979                 return;
00980     }
00981 else if (uip_timedout()){
00982                 _PRINTF("Timeout\n");
00983                 if(data != NULL)                memb_free(&noti, data);
00984                 if(conn != NULL)                memb_free(&conns, conn);
00985                 connection_flag = 0;
00986                 return;
00987         }
00988 
00989 else if(conn != NULL){
00990 
00991         // Process for NOTIFY feedback  
00992         if( ((struct RestNotify*)data)->method == NOTIFY ){
00993                 _PRINTF("UIP Poll : Notify feedback\n");
00994   
00995           if(uip_poll()) {
00996       ((struct RestNotify*)data)->timeout++;
00997 
00998        if(((struct RestNotify*)data)->timeout >= 20) {
00999                                 uip_abort();
01000                                 if(data != NULL)                memb_free(&noti, data);
01001                                 if(conn != NULL)                memb_free(&conns, conn);
01002                                 _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Timeout ...\n");
01003                                 return;             
01004                                 }
01005                   }
01006                 else   ((struct RestNotify*)data)->timeout = 0;
01007                 notify_connection(((struct RestNotify*)conn));
01008         }
01009 
01010         // Process for new income connection
01011         else {
01012                 _PRINTF("UIP Poll : Incomming HTTP Request\n");
01013 
01014     if(uip_poll()) {
01015       conn->timeout++;
01016 
01017        if(conn->timeout >= TIMEOUT) {
01018                                 _PRINTF("Timeout connexion ...\n");
01019                                 uip_abort();
01020                                 if(data != NULL)                memb_free(&noti, data);
01021                                 if(conn != NULL)                memb_free(&conns, conn);
01022                                 return ;
01023                     }
01024                   }
01025                 else   conn->timeout = 0;
01026                 handle_connection(data);
01027 
01028         }
01029 }
01030 else {
01031         _PRINTF("UIP abord \n"); 
01032         uip_abort();
01033         if(data != NULL)                memb_free(&noti, data);
01034         if(conn != NULL)                memb_free(&conns, conn);
01035         return;
01036         }
01037 }
01038 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01039 
01040 
01041 static 
01042 void thread_publish_func(void)
01043 {
01044         static struct uip_conn *TCPconn;
01045         static struct RestNotify * conn;
01046         static struct Ressource * PtRessource;
01047 
01048         static int j=0,allocUsed;
01049 
01050         _PRINTF("Process ...\n");
01051         
01052         // Increment count loop
01053         slash.LogLoop++;
01054 
01055         // Update sensor value and log the new value
01056         for(PtRessource = list_head(ressources_list);PtRessource != NULL; PtRessource = PtRessource->next) 
01057                 if(PtRessource->getData != NULL){
01058 
01059                         // Get the new value of the sensor
01060                         _PRINTF("[UPDATE] Ressource value\n");
01061                         PtRessource->value = PtRessource->getData();
01062                         PtRessource->time = slash.time;
01063                         
01064                         // If time to be log
01065                         if(slash.LogLoop * PROCESS_TIME > PROCESS_TIME_LOG){
01066 
01067                                 if(PtRessource->next == NULL)
01068                                         slash.LogLoop = 0;
01069                                 _PRINTF("[LOG] Ressource value\n");
01070 
01071                                 LOG_DELETE(&RessourceTemp,(char*)slash.Buf,(struct File * )&slash.LogCfsPt,slash.logPt);
01072                                 LOG_NEW(PtRessource,(char*)slash.Buf,(struct File * )&slash.LogCfsPt);
01073 
01074                                 // Increment the pointeur on the next slot for log
01075                                 slash.logPt ++;
01076                                 slash.logPt = slash.logPt % CFS_LOG_COUNT;
01077                                 }
01078                         }
01079                         
01080                 else PtRessource->value = -1;
01081 
01082         // Check for report
01083         if(slash.ReportLoop++ * PROCESS_TIME > PROCESS_TIME_REPORT){
01084                 slash.ReportLoop = 0;
01085 
01086                 j = 0;
01087                 /* If there are not other entries in the file, we break the loop of reading*/
01088                 conn = (struct RestNotify *) memb_alloc(&noti);
01089                 if (conn == NULL){
01090                         _PRINTF("Not enough memory for notify connexion\n");
01091                         etimer_set(&et, CLOCK_SECOND * PROCESS_TIME);
01092                         return;
01093                         }
01094                 else {
01095                         allocUsed = 0;
01096                         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] : memory allocation [SUCCESS]\n");
01097                 }
01098 
01099                 if(REPORT_READ(&conn->Subscriber, CFS_BEGIN) == 0) {
01100                 do {                                    
01101 //printf("%d|%d\n",slash.ReportPt,j);
01102                                         /* Looking for sensors value if a notification is necessary*/
01103                                 if(conn->Subscriber.state == USED && j++ >= slash.ReportPt)
01104                                                 // Check condition of subscribe
01105                                                 if(     Emmal_evaluate (conn->Subscriber.condition)){
01106 
01107                                                                 _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Connecting ...\n");
01108                                                                 // Init the connection parameter
01109                                                                 conn->Subscriber.time = 0;
01110                                                                 conn->timeout = 0;
01111                                                                 conn->method = NOTIFY;
01112                                                                 memcpy(&conn->Subscriber, &conn->Subscriber, sizeof(struct Report));
01113 
01114                                                                 // try to establish TCP connection
01115                                                                 TCPconn = tcp_connect(&conn->Subscriber.host, HTONS(conn->Subscriber.port),conn);  
01116                                                                 if(TCPconn == NULL) {
01117                                                                         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Could not open TCP connection\n");
01118                                                                         uip_abort();
01119                                                                 }
01120                                                                 else {          
01121                                                                         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Notify scheduled...\n");
01122                                                                         allocUsed = 1;
01123                                                                         // Set pointer to next notify report
01124                                                                         slash.ReportPt++;
01125                                                                         if(slash.ReportPt >= CFS_REPORT_COUNT)
01126                                                                                 slash.ReportPt = 0;
01127 
01128                                                                                 /* If there are not other entries in the file, we break the loop of reading*/
01129                                                                         conn = (struct RestNotify *) memb_alloc(&noti);
01130                                                                         if (conn == NULL){
01131                                                                                         _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] Not enough memory : \n");
01132                                                                                         break;
01133                                                                                 }
01134                                                                         else {
01135                                                                                 allocUsed = 0;
01136                                                                                 _PRINTF("[NOTIFY] : memory allocation [SUCCESS]\n");
01137                                                                                 }
01138                                                                         }       
01139                                                 // Break the loop sensor        
01140                                                 break;
01141                                                 }
01142                 if(conn == NULL) break;
01143                 }
01144                 while(REPORT_READ(&conn->Subscriber, CFS_NEXT) == 0);
01145                 }
01146                 else {
01147                         _PRINTF("Notify : Free memory [SUCCESS]\n");
01148                         memb_free(&noti, conn);
01149                 }
01150 
01151         // If no other report must be send and a allocation has been opened
01152         if(allocUsed == 0) {
01153                         slash.ReportPt = 0;
01154 
01155                         _PRINTF("Notify : Free memory [SUCCESS]\n");
01156                         memb_free(&noti, conn);
01157                 }
01158 
01159         } // END PROCESS REPORT
01160 
01161         _PRINTF("End process : [SUCCESS]\n");
01162         etimer_set(&et, CLOCK_SECOND * PROCESS_TIME);
01163 }
01164 
01165 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01166 void Emma_init(){
01167         static char Buf[sizeof(struct Loggable)];
01168         static struct File LogCfsPt;
01169 
01170         
01171         _PRINTF("[Emma init] :\n");
01172         slash.LogLoop = 0;
01173         slash.logPt = 1;
01174         slash.ReportLoop = 0;
01175         slash.ReportPt = 0;
01176 
01177         slash.time = 0;
01178         connection_flag = 0;
01179 
01180         #if SEND_NOTIFY
01181         _PRINTF("[INIT CFS] : ");
01182 //      printf("%d,%d,%d,%d\n",sizeof(struct Report),sizeof(struct Ressource),sizeof(struct RestNotify),sizeof(struct RestConnection));
01183         _PRINTF("[LOG] Format ");
01184         LOG_FORMAT(&RessourceTemp,Buf,&LogCfsPt);
01185         _PRINTF("[OK]\n");
01186         #endif
01187 }
01188 
01189 PROCESS(rest6_server_process, "Rest IPV6 HTTP process");
01190 AUTOSTART_PROCESSES(&rest6_server_process);
01191 
01192 PROCESS_THREAD(rest6_server_process, ev, data)
01193 {
01194   PROCESS_BEGIN();
01195 
01196   // Init listening on the port 80 for TCP/IP packet
01197   ressources_init();
01198   tcp_listen(HTONS(PORT));
01199   memb_init(&noti);
01200   memb_init(&conns);
01201 
01202         #if SEND_NOTIFY
01203                 etimer_set(&et, CLOCK_SECOND * PROCESS_TIME);
01204         #endif
01205 
01206         list_init(ressources_list);
01207         ressources_loader();
01208         Emma_init();
01209 
01210   // Waiting for incomming packet or timer event for check notification
01211   while(1) {
01212 
01213     PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT_UNTIL(ev == tcpip_event || etimer_expired(&et));
01214 
01215                 if(ev == tcpip_event)                           app_rest(data);
01216                 else {
01217                         etimer_set(&et, CLOCK_SECOND * PROCESS_TIME);
01218                         slash.time += PROCESS_TIME;
01219 
01220                 //      if (!connection_flag)           
01221                                 thread_publish_func();
01222                         }
01223   }
01224 
01225 
01226   PROCESS_END();
01227 }
